answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello:
I found some resources that might be helpful to you in your search:
http://www.ncppp.org/undp/srilanka.html
http://www.broward.org/port/masterplan/Pages/Default.aspx
http://www.aapa-ports.org/industry/content.cfm?itemnumber=1022&navitemnumber=901
The first two are case studies that speak to planning and logistics of ports. The third link is an organization that has many resouces such as more case studies, workshops, contacts, and other information that I think can help you even more.
Peggy Chasler
Knowledge Network Intern
pchasler@icma.org

author: Erin Reinders
text: When developing a dynamic Ports Plan, what sorts of features do you think it should included? (i.e. Land Use, Economic Development, Rate Policies and Forecasting) What are some great examples of Ports Plan out there??
title: Ideas for Port Planning
